JobFullDesc: Company DescriptionServiceNow is making the world of work, work better for people. Our cloud‑based platform and solutions deliver digital workflows that create great experiences and unlock productivity for employees and the enterprise. We're growing fast, innovating faster, and making an impact on our customers' and employees' lives in significant and important ways. With over 6,900 customers, we serve approximately 80% of the Fortune 500, and we're on the 2020 list of FORTUNE World's Most Admired Companies.® We’re looking for people who are ready to jump right in and help us build on our incredible momentum, our diverse, engaged workforce, and our purpose to make the world of work, work better. Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.Job DescriptionWhat you get to do in this role:The Delivery Manager is a leader of change, bringing new products and services into the global Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) team in order to continuously deliver improved cloud service reliability to our customers.As a Delivery Manager (Program/Project Manager), you will take large and highly visible programs from vision to release. You will be responsible for providing a proactive, strategic perspective on improvements to SRE products and services, as well as a reactive, tactical view into daily issues. Your primary focus will be development and engineering, but your responsibilities will include cross-functional coordination and collaboration.For your programs, you will be the driving force to:Develop the overall prioritization, milestones, deliverables, and success criteria.Identify and mitigate risks throughout the schedule.Coordinate the day-to-day activities required to deliver great products and services on time.Host regular release meetings and deliver crisp status updates to all stakeholders.Ensure operational readiness for the products and services.Manage external dependencies and logistics.Provide Agile leadership, coaching and training to Product Owners, Scrum Masters, Developers, Testers, functional managers and executives.Deliver hands-on coaching of individual scrum teams in all aspects of scrum - daily meetings, planning, self-organization, collaboration, iterative development, workshops etc.Provide leadership by example.Develop and share best practices.Capture value metrics and provide reporting capabilities to stakeholders.Ensure that SRE requirements are delivered when coordinating with external stakeholders.QualificationsTo be successful in this role you have:5 + years of Project Management experience with SaaS cloud services or cloud infrastructure.Facilitation skills in leading planning meetings, reviews, and retrospectives.Excellent negotiation and persuasion skills.Superior communications and presentation skills.Strong customer orientation.Ability to make decisions independently.Exceptional organizational and planning skills.Excellent leadership and proven people skills.Strong experience with workshop instruction based on Agile, experience with Agile estimation techniques, working knowledge of Agile tools, etc.Experience with SaaS products and cloud environments.PMP & Agile certifications.At least 4 years of pure technical experience such as programming, systems administration, hardware/software, networking, or DBA experience.Additional InformationServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer.
